The information provided does not constitute personal advice, and should only be used for general informational purposes only. The maximum amount that may be borrowed under a Doorsteps Mover personal loan is AUD $250,000. This figure is not a personalised quote or pre-qualification for the Doorsteps Mover product. Your borrowing capacity is subject to an assessment by Doorsteps Solutions Pty Ltd.

Conditions, credit criteria, fees, charges, eligibility criteria and exclusions apply. Applications are subject to assessment by Doorsteps Solutions Pty Ltd and lender approval. Before deciding to apply, you should read the terms and conditions of your loan agreement, seek independent advice and consider whether Doorsteps Mover is right for you. The information provided does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs.
